post:
[VPSNINE](http://www.vpsnine.com) is a virtualization company specializing in linux VPS Hosting. Offering high quality VPS's with professional support.

** KVM PLANS from $5 (128 RAM, 5GB DISK, 100GB Bandwidth, 1 CPU, 1 IP)
=======
* **Zurich, Switzerland** 1000Mbit, IPv6 available
* **Singapore** 10Mbit
* **Cape Town, South Africa** 10Mbit
* [Customize your KVM plan here](https://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/custom-kvm-vps.php)

**OPENVZ PLANS
=======
* **Dusseldorf Germany** 1000Mbit, Instant Setup IPv6 available
* **Zurich, Switzerland** 1000Mbit, Instant Setup IPv6 available
* **New York City, (USA)** 1000Mbit, Instant Setup
* **Chicago, Illinois (USA)** 100Mbit, Instant Setup
* **New York City, (USA)** 1000Mbit, Instant Setup
* **Cape Town, South Africa** 10Mbit, Instant Setup
* **Auckland, New Zealand** 10Mbit, Instant Setup IPv6 available
* **Singapore** 10Mbit, Instant Setup

**Budget 128 Plan - $5 USD**
=======
* 128 MB RAM
* 1x CPU Core
* 5GB Storage
* 150GB Bandwidth
* [Order now](https://www.vpsnine.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=40) or  [Check our budget plans here](https://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/budget-vps.php)


[You can also build your own OpenVZ plan here starting from $5](https://www.vpsnine.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=46)

**Payments:**
=======
* Credit card
* Paypal
* Skrill
* Bitcoin's via BitPay
* Perfect Money
* OKPay
* OKPAY also support payments via Western Union, Ukash, Sofort, Cashu, LiqPay, Qiwi, W1, Przelewy24, MTS, MegaFon, Beeline, Cash4WM, SMS payments and Phone Call Payments.
* Payza


**14 Day Moneyback Guarantee**
If your unhappy with our service for any reason at all within 14 days we'll refund your money! No questions asked. Just log a billing ticket requesting a refund with a breif reason just so we know what we did wrog.

**TESTS:**
For test IPs and files please see : [http://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/testfiles.php](http://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/testfiles.php)
Also check out our Locations page that does a ping from all locations [http://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/locations.php](http://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/locations.php)

**Contact us :**
* E-mail address: **sales@vpsnine.com**
* VPSNine Website [http://www.vpsnine.com Linux VPS Hosting](http://www.vpsnine.com)
